title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 979/93 of 26 April 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1496/80 on the declaration of particulars relating to customs value and on documents to be furnished
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 979/93 of 26 April 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1496/80 on the declaration of particulars relating to customs value and on documents to be furnished
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 2 (1) (a) of Regulation (EEC) No 1496/80 'ECU 3 000' is replaced by 'ECU 5 000'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 May 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 April 1993.
For the Commission
Christiane SCRIVENER
Member of the Commission
